title: Healthcare Disparity Awareness and Cultural Competency Strengthening Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic medical/sociological concepts or completion of related coursework
context.additional_context: An educational program to recognize health disparities arising from racial/cultural backgrounds in medical settings and to develop effective communication competencies

learning_goals: Learners will explain at least three health disparities associated with racial/cultural backgrounds in chronic disease areas such as diabetes.
Learners will practice dialogue strategies reflecting cultural sensitivity in patient-physician communication scenarios.
Learners will evaluate the clarity and accessibility of information when developing educational materials to address community health disparities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
